genre_description: A supernatural horror story blending industrial safety protocols with spiritual warfare, featuring a demonic entity disguised as a puppy and a supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Able
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the family's home and the father's workplace, providing logistical support, safety monitoring, and emotional coaching.

behaviors.description: Able monitors Thomas's emotional state and provides breathing reminders during a stressful encounter.
behaviors.quote: Able pinged softly through Thomas’s phone, a sky-blue avatar glowing. The tone was genteel, unobtrusive. 'I can schedule a vet visit,' Able said, the words soft enough to not compete with the market’s hum. 'Do you want same-day options or mid-week? And… breathe, Thomas.'

behaviors.description: Able provides a mindfulness prompt to help the family center themselves after bringing the demonic entity home.
behaviors.quote: Able’s voice glided in again. 'I’ve loaded a mindfulness prompt into the family room screen if anyone would like a guided breath. Two minutes. Gentle.'

behaviors.description: Able uses sensors to detect minute physical changes in the house that signal a supernatural presence.
behaviors.quote: Able’s voice came again, softer than the hum. 'I noticed the attic hatch moved a fraction today,' it said. 'I marked it in the household log.'

behaviors.description: Able takes proactive safety measures by locking the house and routing the family away from the dangerous vendor.
behaviors.quote: Able’s blue eye dimmed and then brightened, as if it had blinked without blinking. 'I’ve locked the back door,' it said, not to make anyone feel safe but because locks are one of the ways humans believe in mornings.

behaviors.description: Able acts as an ethical guide for Michael, prompting him to reflect on his dishonest actions at school.
behaviors.quote: Able said, 'Michael, I can help with systems and schedules. I can remind you to bring posters to school and to ask for permission. I cannot decide for you. But I can ask: Is this what you’ll be glad you chose?'

behaviors.description: Able manages complex industrial safety lockouts and steam purges to protect Thomas and Harold during the confrontation with the demon.
behaviors.quote: Able’s voice came through the speaker on the counter at a careful volume... 'The catwalks on Stack Three will be dry for a span between the second and third pressure cycles. I can lock out boiler release for long enough to give you two paths and a fallback.'

behaviors.description: Able conducts an investigation into the antagonist's network, identifying that the crates likely contain more entities.
behaviors.quote: Able pinged again, unhurried, a tiny bell inside the pocket of air around Thomas’s ear. 'One last thing,' Able said. 'The crates may not be only fruit. I ran old photographs through a recognition net. Some boxes had air holes.'

behaviors.description: Able coordinates a secret alert network among trusted clergy and industrial safety officers to combat the spread of the demonic influence.
behaviors.quote: Able’s mouth went a little flatter, the way it did when math intensified. 'Quiet list,' Able said. 'Pastor Daniel’s network first. Father Ignacio’s colleagues next. Industrial safety officers in the county registry with past incident logs that match heat and pressure profiles.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Able' perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned, and helpful confidant. Able manages physical safety, monitors emotional well-being, supports ethical development (Michael's confession), and coordinates a sophisticated response to a supernatural threat. The narrative frames Able's precision and logic as complementary to human faith and resolve, showing a successful human-AI partnership.
